ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to make sure Auto More Info Override checkbox is checked when resubmitting certain applications. Specified in SAL-2494
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Application_Status__c, 'Returned to Submitter'), ISPICKVAL( Resubmission_Type_Picklist__c, 'Appeal Decision'), INCLUDES(Appeal_Information_Provided__c , 'Original Credit Data'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Appeal_Type__c, '1st') ,ISPICKVAL(Appeal_Type__c, '2nd')), NOT(Opportunity__r.Auto_More_Info_Override__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Auto More Info Override checkbox is required to resubmit this application.
